title: Faith

My energy so untamed, boy

No need for the cocaine

And if you see my life

Rejection, depression

I woke up one night

Hope intervened when I lost my faith

I never felt so right

Dope into me, now I'm on my shit

Protection, affection

That's all I ever want my dear

Momentum, and then some

I gettin' what I want

I keep my wallet in my pocket with my faith

I pray to God I'll never fall, I'll never fade

Don't need it all, I want it all give me a tasteI keep my wallet in my pocket with my faith
